And here's some tips on adding visual goodness to your idea: http://ideo.pn/vis-uals plus more on evolving your thought-starter: http://ideo.pn/oi-evolve
sounds technical, which factories already make this kind of  antiseptic fabric ?

No factories currently make this fabric, however the technique has been used for years to create sublimated fabric with water/solvent based inks. Iodine Sublimates at a relatively low temperatures, so theoretically you could sublimate Iodine into the fabric to make it have antiseptic properties.
What's the cost or expense to manufacture or apply?

The cost will depend on the quantity made. A starting point for the manufacturing cost would be from USD$1.35  SQM.  Material cost and Iodine cost would depend on quantity purchased, both are much cheaper in mass. Polyester Whicking material suitable for an underlay starts at USD$0.90 SQM. Any material made of Polyester/Microfibre/Lycra/Birdseye can be sublimated.  Sublimation paper is $0.25 SQM lower if used in mass production. Many major factories are currently in operation worldwide producing sublimated clothing, all we would require is iodine to trial the effectiveness of the material at a sublimated garments factory. I have experience in sourcing and producing sublimated garments/materials. Possibly, I can arrange a trial of this material at my sourcing factory in Shanghai, China for no charge.

description:
Using Medically Formulated Iodine Ink Concentrate.

Superior material chemical bond.
Active ingredient iodine is sublimated deep into the fabric fibre.

Long Lasting disinfecting properties.

Moisture Wicking, Breathable Polyester Fabric

Sublimated Iodine Fabric Disinfecting Properties effective against viruses and bacteria.

Increases general hygiene in Isolation Zones.

Increases safety when disposing of contaminated bedding, PPE and Overalls.

Can be easily mass produced

Iodine Sublimated Fabric Production Process

Apply Iodine concentrate to Sublimation paper under low temperature conditions.

Dry Sublimated paper under low temperature conditions.

Using Moisture Wicking, Breathable Polyester Fabric Sublimate Iodine Transfer paper to Polyester fabric using roll to roll calendar heat press.

Optional Treatment: Spray application of hydrophobic Nanocoating Spray to prevent contamination and liquid transmissions.

Cut Fabric to size for PPE, Overalls and bedsheets.
Sew using ultrasonic sewing machines for non-permeable seals.
summary: Mass Produce Iodine Sublimated Medical FabricApplications in many areas including General Hygiene, PPE, Overalls, Bandages and Bedsheets. Increases safety when disposing of contaminated materials.
